item.title: An AFK Command
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

make a void and a boolean and then make a call to it in your process

such as

public void isAfk() { if(AFK == true) { txt4 = "I AM AFK!!!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; } }

and then you would have

public boolean AFK = false;

and in your command you would put

if (command.startsWith("afk") && playerRights >= 2) { sendMessage("Auto-Repeater Started!! "); AFK = true; }

and in process add

isAfk();

Read full topic
